price: Ọba sọ pé: “Ẹ mú (Yūsuf) wá fún mi. Èmi yóò ṣe é ní ẹni ẹ̀ṣà lọ́dọ̀ mi.” Nígbà tí ọba bá a sọ̀rọ̀ tán, ó sọ pé: “Lọ́dọ̀ wa ní òní dájúdájú ìwọ ni ẹni pàtàkì, olùfọkàntán.”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦٓ أَسۡتَخۡلِصۡهُ لِنَفۡسِيۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi astakhliṣ'hu linafsī falammā kallamahu qāla innaka al-yawma ladaynā makīnun amīnun
